com.github.flowersinthesand.spheres

Interface SerializableAction<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Action<T>, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChatVerticle.SendEventAction

    public interface SerializableAction<T>
extends Action<T>, Serializable
    In the case where the application is clustered, to call App's methods retrieving session like App.all(Action), action to be passed should be able to be serialized. In other words, only in those situations, an action should implement Serializable.

    See the provided link, serialization of inner classes including local and anonymous classes, is discouraged and doesn't work in some cases.

    Author:
    Donghwan Kim
    See Also:
    Note of the Serializable Interface
